meanings.sent1: The acridness of the smoke made my eyes water.
meanings.sent2: The acridness of the lemon juice made my mouth pucker.
meanings.sent3: Despite its acridness, the dish was surprisingly popular at the party.
meanings.sent4: The acridness of the argument left a bitter taste in everyone's mouth.
meanings.sent5: The acridness of the medicine lingered long after I had taken it.

meanings.definition: The sharp, bitter taste or smell of something.
meanings.sent1: I couldn't stand the acridness of the burnt toast.
meanings.sent2: The acridness of the vinegar was overpowering in the salad.
meanings.sent3: The acridness of the coffee made me pull a funny face.
meanings.sent4: The acridness of failure hung heavy in the air.
meanings.sent5: The acridness of disappointment was palpable in the room.
